name: Sindoh
0:
”Alexa, ask Three D. Printer to stop printing on printer 1.”
”Alexa, ask Three D. Printer to send me a picture on printer 1.”
”Alexa, ask Three D. Printer the current status on printer 1.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three d. printer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Sindoh skills for Alexa, you can now control your 3DWOX 2X 3D Printers with a variety of functions such as pausing, resuming and stopping the current print or checking the firmware and the status of your 3DWOX 2X.

Enjoy your advanced experience with the Alexa-connected 3DWOX 2X.

Supported models
- 3D2X Series

GETTING STARTED:

To use the Sindoh Skill:
1. Visit https://3dprinter.sindoh.com and join(sign up).
2. Install Alexa App, Login with your Amazon account and download “Sindoh” from the Skills page.
3. Go to “Your Skills” - “Dev Skills”, click “Sindoh” and enable the app.
4. When asked for a Login, please input the same User ID and Password from the https://3dprinter.sindoh.com registration.
5. After the account linking is complete, please connect to https://cloud3d.sindoh.com:3443 and login with the same user ID and password from above.
6. Go to the “Menu” bar and click “Register your printer”.
7. Enter Printer name (numbers 1~20) and Code generated from the printer and press “Submit”.

To generate code from the printer:
1. Click “Cloud” from the 3DWOX 2X display menu.
2. Enter name for your printer (any name).
3. Click “Cloud Service” and click “Generate Code”.
4. Copy and paste the code to Step 7 from above.
**To view the registered users, simply click “Registered Users” from “Cloud”-“Cloud Service”.

SKILL INSTRUCTIONS:

*** NOTICE ***
If you don't specify the printer number (the phrase "on printer (1~20)"), the command will be sent to "Printer 1" as default.

Connect to your 3DWOX 2X Printer and ask: 

Alexa, ask Three D. Printer...:

Pause Printing:
● To Pause Printing on printer (1~20)
● To Freeze Printing on printer (1~20)
● To Suspend Printing on printer (1~20)

Resume printing:
● To restart Printing on printer (1~20)
● To resume Printing on printer (1~20)
● To continue Printing on printer (1~20)

Stop printing:
● To end printing on printer (1~20)
● To cancel printing on printer (1~20)
● To stop printing on printer (1~20)

Turn on the LED light while printing:
● To turn on the light on printer (1~20)
● To turn on the lamp on printer (1~20)
● To switch on the light on printer (1~20)

Turn off the LED light while printing:
● To turn off the light on printer (1~20)
● To turn off the lamp on printer (1~20)
● To switch off the light on printer (1~20)

Send a photo of the current printing:
● To send me a photo on printer (1~20)
● To send me a picture on printer (1~20)
● To send me an image on printer (1~20)

Current firmware version:
● The current firmware on printer (1~20)
● The firmware version on printer (1~20)
● The firmware on printer (1~20)

Current status:
● The current status on printer (1~20)
● The status on printer (1~20)
● The current state on printer (1~20)

Current material type:
● The current material on printer (1~20)
● The current cartridge on printer (1~20)
● The current filament on printer (1~20)

Current filament remainder:
● The remaining cartridge percentage on printer (1~20)
● The cartridge remainder on printer (1~20)
● The cartridge balance on printer (1~20)

For help in activation, please visit https://3dprinter.sindoh.com/support/downloads for more information.

Troubleshooting: Please visit https://3dprinter.sindoh.com, sign in and submit a Contact Us case.
Our agents will provide answers within the 24-hour basis.

Thank you and Happy Printing!
